text: Stephen James "Steve" Doocy (; born October 19, 1956) is an American network- television personality. He works on Fox News and is a best selling author. He is known for being a co-host of Fox & Friends. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:American television personalities Category:American novelists Category:American political commentators Category:Fox News people Category:Writers from Iowa
title: Steve Doocy
